descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**Sportvida CyberDash** is a **VR running game** that blends **stress relief** with **thrilling challenges**. Set in a high-speed, futuristic world of light and technology, you'll sprint, dodge, and break through obstacles, offering an unparalleled sense of release. Whether you’re **punching**, **slashing**, or **ramming**, every action is designed to relieve stress while testing your reflexes and physical limits.
[media]

In this breathtaking and luminous future world, your mission is to race to the finish line in the shortest time possible, breaking through anything that stands in your way. The game’s stunning visual effects, combined with its high-energy soundscape, immerse you in a sensation of speed and power like never before. **Whether you're a fitness enthusiast or simply seeking stress relief, this game will help you find your rhythm and rediscover joy in movement.**

[media]
# 🏃‍♂️Stress-Free Running: 

In the light-speed world of SPORTVIDA, run freely and smash through obstacles! It’s the ultimate way to relieve stress, **challenging yourself while enjoying the thrill of high-speed excitement.**
[media]


# 💥Thrilling Strikes: 
Three strike modes: punching, slashing, and ramming. Choose your rhythm, strike with precision, and create **a unique and exhilarating dash-strike experience.**
[media]

# 💪Casual Fitness: 
Sweat it out in-game and make fitness fun! **Remember to warm up before starting, grab your towel, and get ready for an exciting workout challenge!**
[media]
